alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 12 at 9:04AM PDT until October 12 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Ventura County Valleys, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Calabasas and Agoura Hills, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
